title: OPF praises PM for restoration of Islamabad zone five housing scheme
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 7 (APP):Overseas Pakistanis Foundation (OPF) Monday expressed gratitude to Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif for restoration of  Islamabad zone five OPF Housing Scheme and resolution of its problems.The foundation in a statement said that resolving issues of OPF Housing Scheme would provide an opportunity to the overseas Pakistanis to build homes in their country.The revival of scheme of Overseas Pakistanis Housing Foundation became possible due to the action taken by the Prime Ministerâ€™s Inspection Commission, and the appreciable role of prime minister in the issue.
